title: My Portfolio
desc: This portfolio is made with Vue.js and Ikhmal used Figma to design it. He planned to use Bootstrap for his CSS but there're not a lot of components in here so he decided to just use vanilla css instead

title: AmbankSpot Malaysia
desc: This website is made with Wordpress with a custom theme and custom plugin installed for it. He also use a popular web builder plugin called Elementor and used Jquery as his goto library. (yea i know its old but its easy for beginners right?)

title: Honda Malaysia
desc: The website is  made with Laravel eventhough his seniors made it, Ikhmal still updates the site when there're new promotions or campaign comes out

title: Pavilion Damansara Heights
desc: It is also made with Wordpress and yes, he did used Jquery for it.  This website uses plugins such as Visual Composer (web builder), WPForm and Revolution Slider
